name: mr_pete
text: Now y'all pay attention cause he ain't gonna show y'all this twice.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Well, that explains...very little.

name: aaron_haynes
text: The phrasing in panel 3 is genius.

name: spinynorman
text: Those cats are shocked.

name: gazdatronik
text: My favorite is that he has taken these with a digital camera, as at this point he probly doesn't own a scanner yet.

name: gmm
text: Yeah. I realise why people don't dig this one but for me it's a 5 for "It shocks these cats"

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "There are hundreds of original doodles for sale."

name: woodenteeth
text: timing is blocked on paper... nice.

name: norrin
text: The low rating shows most people didn't go for this, but I like little behind the scenes info like this.

name: professorhazard
text: What does he use to draw these comics? AutoCAD?

name: highpitch_83
text: I've been wondering the same... It looks like it in the early years...

name: snowman
text: Illustrator, I thought.

name: starman11
text: Origin of a Species. A Species of Cats.

name: al_batross
text: Clearly, Téodor's posturing in panel two suggests a vital comment on modern society: Posing for something dirty is always important during brainstorming.

name: orvel
text:
It shocks...

THESE CATS.

name: snowman
text: THESE KNIVES

name: kelsotimebomb
text: It FELL through those cats, man!

name: theplaidknight
text: How is this not above 4 at least?

name: dovey
text: Cos it's not that good?

name: shoinan
text:
Blasphemy!

Accurate blasphemy, but still... Blasphemy!

name: idsyen
text: So it seems that we owe the existence of Ray, Beef and Pat to this single phrase, which has totally ceased to relate to them as characters.

name: spaceandrew
text: Without that precious genesis, we wouldn't have Roast Beef or Ray.
